Posts.Content: Good for you. Your experience feels familiar. Who you are is one in a million, a special new person, who has widened her view of herself and her incedible abilities. You will be able to ditch old bad habits, because you are having to work through everything anew. Do try painting and that goes for anyone else who is interested, it expresses things that other 'beers' never reach. Every best wish.
Posts.Title: Who am I now? Answers on a postcard please.....
